articles.title: Digital bank Monzo posts first full year of profit after more than doubling revenue - CNBC

articles.content:
Monzo, the British digital challenger bank, on Monday reported its first full year of profitability.
The fintech startup said in annual financial results that its pre-tax profits totaled £15.4 milli… [+822 chars]

articles.content:
